department.en: Master Program in Biomedical Engineering, Department of Biomedical Sciences and Engineering
department.ch: 生醫科學與工程學系生物醫學工程碩士班

goal.en: This course aims to provide the students the background knowledge about how to aquire the medical images and how to analysis them in order to get useful information. Several techniques that could enhance the quality of medical images will be introduced and hands-on pratice will be included.
goal.ch: 本課程主要介紹醫學影像檢查項目，包含一般Ｘ光、超音波、電腦斷層、磁振造影等檢查及以實際影像處理演算法應用於不同醫學影像之檢查等。本課程之目標是想讓學生瞭解醫學影像成像原理與其特性之基礎，並藉由數位影像處理技術之實際應用與操作，如此可讓學生瞭解醫學影像處理在臨床醫學診斷輔助之重要性，並提供未來升學研究、或進入產業界等應用領域之基礎。

content.en:
1. Introduction : overview
2. Introduction to Medical Image : the fundamental physics
3. Introduction to X-ray image/ CT
4. Image quality and information content and point processing
5. Edge detection
6. Image enhancement in the frequency domain
7. Introduction to SPECT/PET
8. Image Segmentation
9. mid-term exam
10. Introduction to MRI /fMRI
11. Image Registration
12. Artefact removal
13. Image morphology
14. Feature extraction/ pattern(object ) recognition
15. Image representation and description
16. Colour Image Processing/ Image compression
17. Project presentation
18. final exam
